snippet: Archaelogists excavating what is described as the largest ancient tomb discovered in Greece say they have found two caryatids, large female figures apparently meant to guard the tomb’s treasures.
abstract: Archaelogists excavating what is described as the largest ancient tomb discovered in Greece say they have found two caryatids, large female figures apparently meant to guard the tomb’s treasures.

headline.main: Ancient Greek Tomb Yields Two Large Statues
